mn67:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā cātumāyaṃ viharati āmalakīvane.
mn67:3.3: Tena kho pana samayena sāriputtamoggallānappamukhāni pañcamattāni bhikkhusatāni cātumaṃ anuppattāni honti bhagavantaṃ dassanāya.
mn67:3.4: Te ca āgantukā bhikkhū nevāsikehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisammodamānā senāsanāni paññāpayamānā pattacīvarāni paṭisāmayamānā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā ahesuṃ.
mn67:3.5: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi:
mn67:3.6: “ke panete, ānanda, uccāsaddā mahāsaddā, kevaṭṭā maññe macchavilope”ti? “
mn67:3.7: Etāni, bhante, sāriputtamoggallānappamukhāni pañcamattāni bhikkhusatāni cātumaṃ anuppattāni bhagavantaṃ dassanāya.
mn67:3.8: Te āgantukā bhikkhū nevāsikehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisammodamānā senāsanāni paññāpayamānā pattacīvarāni paṭisāmayamānā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā”ti. “
mn67:3.9: Tenahānanda, mama vacanena te bhikkhū āmantehi:
mn67:3.11: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paṭissutvā yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami;
mn67:3.14: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato ānandassa paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
mn67:3.16: Ekamantaṃ nisinne kho te bhikkhū bhagavā etadavoca:
mn67:3.17: “kiṃ nu tumhe, bhikkhave, uccāsaddā mahāsaddā, kevaṭṭā maññe macchavilope”ti?
mn67:3.18: “Imāni, bhante, sāriputtamoggallānappamukhāni pañcamattāni bhikkhusatāni cātumaṃ anuppattāni bhagavantaṃ dassanāya.
mn67:3.19: Teme āgantukā bhikkhū nevāsikehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisammodamānā senāsanāni paññāpayamānā pattacīvarāni paṭisāmayamānā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā”ti.
mn67:3.20: “Gacchatha, bhikkhave, paṇāmemi vo, na vo mama santike vatthabban”ti.
mn67:3.21: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paṭissutvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya pakkamiṃsu.
mn67:4.1: Tena kho pana samayena cātumeyyakā sakyā santhāgāre sannipatitā honti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
mn67:4.2: Addasaṃsu kho cātumeyyakā sakyā te bhikkhū dūratova āgacchante;
mn67:4.7: “Tenahāyasmanto muhuttaṃ nisīdatha, appeva nāma mayaṃ sakkuṇeyyāma bhagavantaṃ pasādetun”ti.
mn67:4.8: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū cātumeyyakānaṃ sakyānaṃ paccassosuṃ.
mn67:4.9: Atha kho cātumeyyakā sakyā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
mn67:4.11: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho cātumeyyakā sakyā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
mn67:4.14: Seyyathāpi, bhante, bhagavatā pubbe bhikkhusaṃgho anuggahito;
mn67:4.16: Santettha, bhante, bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ.
mn67:4.17: Tesaṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya alabhantānaṃ siyā aññathattaṃ, siyā vipariṇāmo.
mn67:4.18: Seyyathāpi, bhante, bījānaṃ taruṇānaṃ udakaṃ alabhantānaṃ siyā aññathattaṃ siyā vipariṇāmo;
mn67:4.19: evameva kho, bhante, santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ, tesaṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya alabhantānaṃ siyā aññathattaṃ, siyā vipariṇāmo.
mn67:4.20: Seyyathāpi, bhante, vacchassa taruṇassa mātaraṃ apassantassa siyā aññathattaṃ, siyā vipariṇāmo;
mn67:4.21: evameva kho, bhante, santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ, tesaṃ bhagavantaṃ apassantānaṃ siyā aññathattaṃ, siyā vipariṇāmo.
mn67:4.24: Seyyathāpi, bhante, bhagavatā pubbe bhikkhusaṃgho anuggahito;
mn67:5.1: Atha kho brahmā sahampati bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya—
mn67:5.2: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya;
mn67:5.5: Atha kho brahmā sahampati ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca: “
mn67:5.8: Seyyathāpi, bhante, bhagavatā pubbe bhikkhusaṃgho anuggahito;
mn67:5.10: Santettha, bhante, bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ, tesaṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya alabhantānaṃ siyā aññathattaṃ, siyā vipariṇāmo.
mn67:5.11: Seyyathāpi, bhante, bījānaṃ taruṇānaṃ udakaṃ alabhantānaṃ siyā aññathattaṃ, siyā vipariṇāmo;
mn67:5.12: evameva kho, bhante, santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ, tesaṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya alabhantānaṃ siyā aññathattaṃ, siyā vipariṇāmo.
mn67:5.13: Seyyathāpi, bhante, vacchassa taruṇassa mātaraṃ apassantassa siyā aññathattaṃ, siyā vipariṇāmo;
mn67:5.14: evameva kho, bhante, santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ, tesaṃ bhagavantaṃ apassantānaṃ siyā aññathattaṃ, siyā vipariṇāmo.
mn67:5.17: Seyyathāpi, bhante, bhagavatā pubbe bhikkhusaṃgho anuggahito;
mn67:6.1: Asakkhiṃsu kho cātumeyyakā ca sakyā brahmā ca sahampati bhagavantaṃ pasādetuṃ bījūpamena ca taruṇūpamena ca.
mn67:6.2: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn67:6.4: Pasādito bhagavā cātumeyyakehi ca sakyehi brahmunā ca sahampatinā bījūpamena ca taruṇūpamena cā”ti. “
mn67:6.5: Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa paṭissutvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pattacīvaramādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
mn67:6.7: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
mn67:6.8: “kinti te, sāriputta, ahosi mayā bhikkhusaṃghe paṇāmite”ti?
mn67:6.11: Appossukko dāni bhagavā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ anuyutto viharissati, mayampi dāni appossukkā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāramanuyuttā viharissāmā’”ti.
mn67:6.12: “Āgamehi tvaṃ, sāriputta, āgamehi tvaṃ, sāriputta, diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāran”ti.
mn67:6.13: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ āmantesi:
mn67:6.14: “kinti te, moggallāna, ahosi mayā bhikkhusaṃghe paṇāmite”ti?
mn67:6.17: Appossukko dāni bhagavā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ anuyutto viharissati, ahañca dāni āyasmā ca sāriputto bhikkhusaṃghaṃ pariharissāmā’”ti.
mn67:6.19: Ahaṃ vā hi, moggallāna, bhikkhusaṃghaṃ parihareyyaṃ sāriputtamoggallānā vā”ti.
mn67:7.5: imāni, bhikkhave, cattāri bhayāni udakorohante pāṭikaṅkhitabbāni.
mn67:7.6: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, cattārimāni bhayāni idhekacce puggale imasmiṃ dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajite pāṭikaṅkhitabbāni.
mn67:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hoti:
mn67:8.3: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto;
mn67:8.4: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn67:8.5: Tamenaṃ tathā pabbajitaṃ samānaṃ sabrahmacārī ovadanti, anusāsanti:
mn67:8.6: ‘evaṃ te abhikkamitabbaṃ, evaṃ te paṭikkamitabbaṃ, evaṃ te ālokitabbaṃ, evaṃ te vilokitabbaṃ, evaṃ te samiñjitabbaṃ, evaṃ te pasāritabbaṃ, evaṃ te saṅghāṭipattacīvaraṃ dhāretabban’ti.
mn67:8.8: ‘mayaṃ kho pubbe agāriyabhūtā samānā aññe ovadāma, anusāsāma.
mn67:8.9: Ime panamhākaṃ puttamattā maññe, nattamattā maññe, amhe ovaditabbaṃ anusāsitabbaṃ maññantī’ti.
mn67:8.11: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ūmibhayassa bhīto sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatto.
mn67:9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hoti:
mn67:9.3: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto;
mn67:9.4: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn67:9.5: Tamenaṃ tathā pabbajitaṃ samānaṃ sabrahmacārī ovadanti anusāsanti:
mn67:9.6: ‘idaṃ te khāditabbaṃ, idaṃ te na khāditabbaṃ;
mn67:9.7: idaṃ te bhuñjitabbaṃ, idaṃ te na bhuñjitabbaṃ;
mn67:9.8: idaṃ te sāyitabbaṃ, idaṃ te na sāyitabbaṃ;
mn67:9.9: idaṃ te pātabbaṃ, idaṃ te na pātabbaṃ;
mn67:9.10: kappiyaṃ te khāditabbaṃ, akappiyaṃ te na khāditabbaṃ;
mn67:9.11: kappiyaṃ te bhuñjitabbaṃ, akappiyaṃ te na bhuñjitabbaṃ;
mn67:9.12: kappiyaṃ te sāyitabbaṃ, akappiyaṃ te na sāyitabbaṃ;
mn67:9.13: kappiyaṃ te pātabbaṃ, akappiyaṃ te na pātabbaṃ;
mn67:9.14: kāle te khāditabbaṃ, vikāle te na khāditabbaṃ;
mn67:9.15: kāle te bhuñjitabbaṃ, vikāle te na bhuñjitabbaṃ;
mn67:9.16: kāle te sāyitabbaṃ, vikāle te na sāyitabbaṃ;
mn67:9.17: kāle te pātabbaṃ, vikāle te na pātabban’ti.
mn67:9.19: ‘mayaṃ kho pubbe agāriyabhūtā samānā yaṃ icchāma taṃ khādāma, yaṃ na icchāma na taṃ khādāma;
mn67:9.20: yaṃ icchāma taṃ bhuñjāma, yaṃ na icchāma na taṃ bhuñjāma;
mn67:9.21: yaṃ icchāma taṃ sāyāma, yaṃ na icchāma na taṃ sāyāma;
mn67:9.22: yaṃ icchāma taṃ pivāma, yaṃ na icchāma na taṃ pivāma;
mn67:9.31: Yampi no saddhā gahapatikā divā vikāle paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ denti tatthapime mukhāvaraṇaṃ maññe karontī’ti.
mn67:9.33: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, kumbhīlabhayassa bhīto sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatto.
mn67:10.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hoti:
mn67:10.3: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto;
mn67:10.4: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn67:10.5: So evaṃ pabbajito samāno pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisati.
mn67:10.6: Arakkhiteneva kāyena arakkhitāya vācāya anupaṭṭhitāya satiyā asaṃvutehi indriyehi so tattha passati gahapatiṃ vā gahapatiputtaṃ vā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitaṃ samaṅgībhūtaṃ paricārayamānaṃ.
mn67:10.8: ‘mayaṃ kho pubbe agāriyabhūtā samānā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitā samaṅgībhūtā paricārimhā.
mn67:10.9: Saṃvijjanti kho pana me kule bhogā.
mn67:10.10: Sakkā bhoge ca bhuñjituṃ puññāni ca kātun’ti.
mn67:10.12: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, āvaṭṭabhayassa bhīto sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatto.
mn67:11.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hoti:
mn67:11.3: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto;
mn67:11.4: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn67:11.5: So evaṃ pabbajito samāno pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisati.
mn67:11.6: Arakkhiteneva kāyena arakkhitāya vācāya anupaṭṭhitāya satiyā asaṃvutehi indriyehi so tattha passati mātugāmaṃ dunnivatthaṃ vā duppārutaṃ vā.
mn67:11.7: Tassa mātugāmaṃ disvā dunnivatthaṃ vā duppārutaṃ vā rāgo cittaṃ anuddhaṃseti.
mn67:11.8: So rāgānuddhaṃsena cittena sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
mn67:11.9: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, susukābhayassa bhīto sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatto.
mn67:11.11: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri bhayāni, idhekacce puggale imasmiṃ dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajite pāṭikaṅkhitabbānī”ti.
mn67:12.2: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
